did.head: Descriptive Summary

did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 75 items.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions

University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Elsie Fowke Jackson Papers, Accession #6589-e, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was given to the University by Mrs. Elsie Fowke Jackson of Alexandria, Virginia, in October 1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection includes ca. 75 items, 1816-1819, and 1867-1973, primarily of the Fowke and Reed families. The materials have been arranged in three series: a manuscripts series, including correspondence, geneological material, receipts and photographs; a printed series, including magazine and newspaper clippings; and a series of bound materials.

did.unittitle: Correspondence: William H. Dolman to Mr. Reed 1870 April 3
Correspondence: business and receipts, of Captain R. J. Fowke 1887-1906
Geneological material: typescript from Fowke and Washington-Reed family bibles, material re Colonel Gerrard Fowke and Captain Samuel Baker Fowke, photocopy of landgrant from Charles II to Anne Fowke
Photograph, and accompanying newspaper clipping n.d.
Newspaper clippings: re Fowke, Reed and Eskridge families 1920-1973
3 Bound volumes: 2 datebooks: 1 unidentified, 1 of Thomas Jenkins (with enclosures) 1 account book: of Robert B. Reed 1816, 1819 and 1869
